translations: n．神枪手，狙击手：具有高超射击技巧的人，尤指在军事行动中负责精确射击的士兵。
· The army has trained a group of sharpshooters for special missions.
军队训练了一批神枪手执行特殊任务。

sentences.sentence: He is considered one of the best sharpshooters.
sentences.translation: 他被视为最优秀的投手之一。

sentences.sentence: They got sharpshooters in helicopters on the lookout for polar bears.
sentences.translation: 他们的直升机上配有神枪手，时刻注意着是否有北极熊出没。

sentences.sentence: Tao Luna has become famous as one of the world's most precise sharpshooters. ;
sentences.translation: 陶路娜以世界非常准确的 神枪手之一然而成名。
